story.title: Our Story
content: At Lone Star Shine Exterior Cleaning, we’re more than a cleaning company—we’re two local entrepreneurs, Mateo and Logan, driven by a passion for exterior cleaning. As a minority-owned business rooted in Austin, TX, we take pride in serving the community that shaped us. Our commitment to window cleaning and pressure washing goes beyond just getting the job done—it’s about bringing joy and pride to every property we touch.

Growing up in the Greater Austin area, we learned the value of hard work and honest service. Every gutter cleaning or house washing project we take on reflects our dedication to quality and care. We treat your home or business like our own, ensuring every detail shines with the Lone Star Shine promise of excellence.

Choosing us means choosing a team that’s invested in Austin’s beauty and pride. Our expertise in roof washing and gutter cleaning ensures your property looks great and stays protected. As local entrepreneurs, we understand the unique needs of our community, delivering tailored solutions with unmatched care and attention to detail.

values.title: Why Cache Valley Chooses Us
values.subtitle: We're committed to excellence in every aspect of our Logan and Northern Utah exterior cleaning services

items.title: Licensed & Insured
items.description: Fully licensed Utah professionals with comprehensive insurance coverage for complete peace of mind throughout Cache Valley.

items.title: Reliable Service
items.description: Punctual, professional service with flexible scheduling to fit your busy Logan and Cache Valley lifestyle.

items.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
items.description: 100% satisfaction guarantee on all our Northern Utah exterior cleaning services. If you're not happy, we'll make it right.

items.title: Local Community Focus
items.description: Owner-operated business deeply rooted in the Logan and Cache Valley community, invested in your satisfaction and our local reputation.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced exterior cleaning professionals dedicated to serving the Logan and Cache Valley community
